features.title: Dedicated Co-Working Space
features.description: Optimize your productivity with 24/7 access to a creative coworking environment, equipped with ergonomic sit/stand desks, smart TVs, and ample natural light.

features.title: Blazing Fast Internet
features.description: Stay connected with business-grade 1 Gbps symmetric fiber. Whether you're working remotely, attending virtual meetings, or streaming, our high-speed internet ensures zero downtime.

features.title: Flexible Month-to-Month Leases
features.description: Enjoy complete flexibility with month-to-month lease options, perfect for digital nomads or professionals looking for both short-term and long-term stays.

features.title: Walkable Neighborhood
features.description: Cafes, restaurants, bars, supermarkets, parks, and food trucks all within a 15-minute walk. Explore and socialize without needing a car.

features.title: Community Events & Meetups
features.description: Join a thriving community of entrepreneurs, freelancers, and creatives. Regular events and meetups help you network, collaborate, and unwind.

features.title: Local Community Manager
features.description: Our on-site community manager ensures you have a smooth stay, while also organizing events and meetups to help you connect with other residents and locals.

features.title: Fully Furnished Bedrooms
features.description: Spacious, fully furnished rooms provide the comfort you need, with fresh linens and towels. Choose between private or shared bathrooms based on your preferences.

features.title: Fully Equipped Kitchen
features.description: For those who value a home-cooked meal or need the flexibility to prepare their own food, the fully equipped kitchen provides everything you need.

features.title: Safety & Security
features.description: Enjoy peace of mind with top-tier security, including exterior cameras, fenced premises, and smart locks on each bedroom.

features.title: Outdoor Deck & Backyard
features.description: Take a break, collaborate, or relax in the shaded outdoor areas. Perfect for working in the fresh air or enjoying downtime with fellow residents.

features.title: Regular Cleaning Services
features.description: Keep your focus on work or leisure while we handle the cleaning. Shared spaces are cleaned regularly for your convenience.

features.title: Free Street Parking
features.description: Convenient street parking available around the property, wrapped by two streets and an alleyway for easy access.
